item.title: Maryannfreesmith add a quote by HIllerman, Tony
item.description: "IF you are not for yourself, who will be for you? If you are only for yourself, what are you? If not now, when?" -- HIllerman, Tony

item.title: Maryannfreesmith add a quote by Richard Llewellyn
item.description: "O, there is lovely to feel a book, a good book, firm in the hand, for its fatness holds rich promise, and you are hot inside to think of good hours to come." -- Richard Llewellyn

item.title: Maryannfreesmith add a quote by Jacqueline Winspear
item.description: "Grace isn't a little prayer you chant before receiving a meal. It's a way to live." -- Jacqueline Winspear

item.title: Maryannfreesmith add a quote by Erma Bombeck
item.description: "When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left, and could say, 'I used everything you gave me." -- Erma Bombeck

item.title: Maryannfreesmith add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Take no heed of her.... She reads a lot of books." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Maryannfreesmith add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon
